actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary..

official_title: Joint resolution to pay tribute to law enforcement officers of this country on Law Day, May 1, 1973.

summary.text: Provides that in the celebration of Law Day, May 1, 1973, special emphasis be given by a grateful people to the law enforcement officers of the United States of America for their unflinching and devoted service in helping to preserve the domestic tranquility and guaranteeing to the individual his rights under the law.

titles.title: Joint resolution to pay tribute to law enforcement officers of this country on Law Day, May 1, 1973.
